description:
Harley is back!

He's one of my favorites and I haven't seen him since the beginning of the year. It's funny how fast time goes by!

I was really happy to hook up with him again and I was amazed at how good he looked! He's been busy with a lot of "conventional" modeling, so he's grown his hair out and he's more tan than before. He's lean and tight and sporting a hairy chest and a nice full pubic bush!

And, as always, he's got that perfect white smile, disarming personality, and big, uncut dick.

Mitch was waiting in the next room when Harley arrived. I had them meet and they immediately hit it off. I had to leave them to get ready for the shoot and I could hear them, in the other room, talking and laughing just like they were old buds.

"I am going to FUCK my friend here," Harley said, once we finally got started.

I forgot that about Harley. He likes to take charge.

"Maybe," he said with a coy look on his face, "I'd like to make out a little bit and then get a little head."

Well, they ended up doing more than that. Sucking, rimming, 69-ing, and fucking...

Mitch has become quite the little hot jock bottom!
title: Harley & Mitch
